resources.string: Enable TCP/IP debugging over network interfaces (Wi\u2011Fi, USB networks). This setting is reset on reboot.

WARNING: When ADB over network is enabled, your phone is open for intrusions on all connected networks!

Only use this feature when you are connected on trusted networks.

Do you really want to enable this function?
Dynamic Resolution Switch needs to restart the UI.\n\nDo you want to continue?
Error: You need to be connected to a WiFi!
Use the 8MP camera mode for higher FPS and better nightmode picture quality. Disable to use the 23MP mode.
On some tablets we have a different actuator, change this settings if you\'re experiencing issues.
A reboot is required for the changes to take effect!
